iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.parameters
Class GcmParameters

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.parameters.GcmParameters
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Parameters
public class GcmParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameters

This abstract class encapsulates parameters for the AES-GCM en/decryption 2017/03

Version:
1.0
Author:
Otto Touzil

Constructor Detail

GcmParameters

public GcmParameters(byte[] pIv,
                     byte[] pAad,
                     long ulTagBits)
Create a new GCMParameters object with the given attributes.
Parameters:
pIv - Initialization vector
pAad - additional authentication data. This data is authenticated but not encrypted.
ulTagBits - length of authentication tag (output following ciphertext) in bits. (0 - 128) depending on the algorithm implementation within the hsm, ulTagBits may be any one of the following five values: 128, 120, 112, 104, or 96, may be 64 or 32;
